purpose: To integrate AI capabilities with Rhino 3D for automated design and modeling processes
principle: Utilizes the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to facilitate communication between Rhino 3D and AI agents, enabling automated design tasks
reusability: Designed as a plugin for Rhino 3D, allowing easy integration with existing workflows and AI systems through MCP
limitations: Currently in alpha status, may have limited functionality and stability; specific to Rhino 3D environments
name: rhinomcp
description: RhinoMCP connects Rhino 3D to AI Agent through the Model Context Protocol (MCP)
highlight: Connects Rhino 3D to AI agents using the Model Context Protocol (MCP) for enhanced design automation
